display.title: A rumour of otters
display.creator: Deborah Savage
display.subject: Otters -- Juvenile fiction; Sex role -- Fiction; New Zealand -- Juvenile fiction
display.description: Angry at being left behind when her father and brother go off to muster sheep, Alexa decides to search in the wild for the otters previously seen only by a mystical Maori tribesman.
